1.2.0.name: wordpress/wp-hyves
1.2.0.description:
Import friends and Post to Hyves: a social networking website.

Notable Features

  1. Post to Hyves blog.
  2. Post What Where's to Hyves.
  3. Import Friends from Hyves.
  4. Import What Where's of Friends.
  5. Import Tips from Friends.
  6. Import Scraps.
  7. My Friends Cloud Sidebar Widget.
  8. Tips from Friends Sidebar Widget.
  9. WWWs from Friends Sidebar Widget
  • Compatible with WordPress MU.

Feature requests are welcome!

Hyves on your blog.

Join the WP-Hyves Hyve at: http://wp-hyves.hyves.net/.
